name: Fury and Fang
description: Embrace instinct. Unleash aggression. Demand respect.

skinlines.name: Primal Ambush
skinlines.description: Those lucky enough to be born with glowing markings on their skin are revered among their people as “Favorclaw.” These special Tigrasbornes are destined to represent their community and demand the respect of others with their strength. They each hope to conquer the world in the name of their kind and become the leader feared by all.
